title: vEdAnta kEsariyE
sahitya:
vEdAnta kEsariyE vivEkAnandA vEdAnta kEsariyE


anupallavi

  jyOti svarUpA guNAtItA jnAnap-prabOdhA


caraNam 1    vIrA mAyayai venra dhIrA bhayattaik-konra sUrA
Ulagirkk-upakArA karuNaikkaDalE bhArata dEsattin
sIr OngiDavE deivat-tArakamAga vanda pUraNanE vaNakkam
    caraNam 2    attA parama pari shuddhA shrI rAmakrSNa bhaktA
nittiya jIvan muktA munivarkkarasE tatvam asi ennum 
advaita dIpamETri vaittAi ulagu pOTrum siddhA singamE jaya
